metadata.dc:author: Minisola, Giovanni
metadata.dc:description: Musculoskeletal diseases are tile most frequent cause of pain in the working population. Rheumatic diseases are chronic illnesses, cause of functional impairnment, relevant working disability and absence from work; however, affected patients maintain a significant functional ability. In this context, the "Fit for work" project, operating in Italy since 2012, promotes the management of chronic musculoskeletal conditions through the realization, also in our country, of a rheumatic medical assistance network in behalf of workers affected by rheumatic diseases and other musculoskeletal disabiliting conditions.
metadata.dc:title: Malattie reumatiche e capacit√† lavorativa.
[Rheumatic diseases and work ability].
metadata.dc:publisher: Giornale italiano di medicina del lavoro ed ergonomia
